website_summaries.verdict: If you need a pool for small spaces, small people, or even pets, consider this mini pool from Intex.
pros: Foam padded horizontal beams provide comfort
Includes drain plug and repair patch kit.Measures approximately 48" x 48" x 12" deep
cons: Feet and poles don't snap together and can fall over when assembling

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler and his baby friends love this! We tried several blow up pools which all came with holes before ending up on this one. This is a nice, thick plastic. Doesn’t seem like it could tear easily. I didn’t even notice it had cushioned arms around the edges which was a plus. I didn’t want to set this on the lawn and kill our grass so we placed it on pinestraw. I worried it wouldn’t be comfortable to sit or stand on but it’s not at all. Update: Using for a ball pit indoors for the fall. Successful so far
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold up to dog use.
customer_reviews.text: so I bought this pool on the recommendations of other customers. It was purchased to use as a cooling pool for the dog, well 5 min after filling it up and letting the dog play i had a 3" hole in the bottom of it. This is a well manicured small dog. So if you are buying this for your dog, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a thick liner at all for large breeds. Lasted 7 days.
customer_reviews.text: Pool only lasted 1 week before multiple holes were torn in it. I bought based on the reviews that dogs could play but appeartly not mine? The set up is easy, the pool,is sturdy but the liner wasn’t as thick I as expected, and those dremeled nails still went right thru.
customer_reviews.author: G.McNeal

customer_reviews.title: I love these pools
customer_reviews.text: I love these pools. They come in hand for whelping for our dogs. Very good quality and super easy to clean and put away.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla haas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any dog household!
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherds are absolutely water dogs. We’ve always used the plastic kiddie pools but their durability isn’t the best against teeth and nails. This pool has definitely withstood all the abuse from our dogs. Super simple to set up. Easy to clean. Easy to refill. My dogs absolutely LOVED this. My husband will be adding a drain line next year so the water isn’t draining around the pool making a total mud pit! The draining water wouldn’t be an issue if it was on concrete, pavement or decking. But, we use it in the dog yard which doesn’t have hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy...no instuctions
customer_reviews.text: If you’re someone who needs instructions...this comes with none. Set it up today. Seems sturdy. No leaks. It has a plug at the bottom which I wasn’t aware of and am grateful for. Four stars due to lack of instructions (not horribly difficult, but could’ve been easier) and cheap plastic connectors inside the frame which move around and make construction more difficult than it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Great Multipurpose Pool
customer_reviews.text: This little pool is awesome. My kiddo is enjoying it as her ball pit. This is some where around 2400 balls.
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: After having it for a few weeks I'm kind of unhappy with it. The legs keep falling off! It's very irritating because I put one back on and then the next one falls! And the holes in the legs are growing rust. I'm going to check if this is still returnable...
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Yahtzee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a super durable pool for my kids (3&5) that the dogs can't pop! However, on the first day of use, my wife's 12 month old "puppy" tore out the drainage cap. This was easily fixed with some gorilla tape, and we now drain it by pulling off the legs and letting gravity do the rest... This method is much faster anyways:)
customer_reviews.author: Juston

customer_reviews.title: Beware!! It's a big ugly sandwich bag on reinforced straws
customer_reviews.text: Hollow plastic everything. The plastic pieces that are supposed to hold it together are completely loose and get stuck in it easily, it's covered in a foam that is supposed to prevent the tarp-like plastic from ripping but the foam isn't stuck on so it is constantly shifting and isn't even long enough to cover the length of the weird linkng to hold up the plastic tarp pool. Corners were cut in absolutely every possible way from quality to material to boxing. Really don't know how anyone kept this except that the return process was harrowing.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for housing my Tortoises!
customer_reviews.text: This pool has been perfect for housing my tortoises inside for the winter. I searched and searched for the perfect item to house my tortoises. I ordered this pool, another bigger sized pool and a pre-made wooden kit. This pool has been the perfect size for them. It durable enough to hold dirt and mulch. I have also been able to clamp the light fixtures to the side with no trouble. The other two (much more expensive ones) are going back. Very happy with this purchase. The price and quality meet expectations for me.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, plenty of room for a 5&3yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool for our little ones! We have a 5 and 3yr old that need something simple to keep them cool this summer. This is it! Currently being used for toys as it's a chilly day today. Was decently easy to put together-- even if the little clips inside the side bars kept sliding inside the bar... That's probably my only complaint! But it feels sturdy and is just deep enough for our kids. Took me probably 30min to put it up. I'd highly recommend if you want a pool that's easy to store, and won't cause serious water spillage like the inflatable ones do, when their side gets stepped on!
customer_reviews.author: cak

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Pool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use for new Mama Dog and her pups. It is perfect! Durable and well constructed. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.White

customer_reviews.title: Not the strongest!
customer_reviews.text: This pool has been perfect for my tall 4yo and my 1.5 year old. They were comfortable to play in it, the height was just right, and all was well. Until today. I attempted to pull the plug to drain the water, as it needed to be cleaned, and the entire area around the plug ripped with it. It cannot be patched, and now we are without a pool. Ugh!! It wasa fun few months (2 1/2) while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Rheanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for a party
customer_reviews.text: For my Ancient Roman birthday party, I needed to put a sunken pool in my living room. So I ordered this pool, swapped the legs for PVC pipe cut a couple inches shorter, and painted the inside of the pool white with an interior wall primer. The pool itself held around 85,000 water beads during the party (came to a few inches deep), and stood up to a bunch of drunk adults walking and falling into it during the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Kandell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy with a drain/plug!
customer_reviews.text: Best kiddie pool I’ve bought. Assembly is so easy! I’ve purchased 4-5 inflatable pools and they always pop. Other plastic pool don’t break down and store as nicely as this one! I love this for my small kiddos. Sides are very sturdy and padded!!!! Kids can hold onto padded sides and they don’t move. Plastic pool material seems durable. We’ve used on deck and yard- both great locations. I am so pleased. Spend $20-30 on several kiddie pools OR buy one pool for $60. My favorite feature is the plug in the corner for easy draining! Used 4 times in a week and so happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Reilly

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY DOG FRIENDLY
customer_reviews.text: SO happy with this purchase. I am using it as a whelping box for my husky and her six newborn puppies. She has so much room, the material is perfect to wipe anything up from accidents and their claws can’t go through!! Set up was fairly easy.. a few parts had clips on the wrong side which threw me off for a few minutes but easy enough where you make do. The price was worth the quality and I love how you can take it a part for storage unlike the round plastic kiddie pools.. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Multiple leaks in first set up
customer_reviews.text: Updated. After two days of use, it leaked everywhere! Cannot find where leak originated from but no tears due to an old turtle with no nails. Patched where I found the leak and came back to check on it again - still leaking! I patched with Flex tape since their patch came creased and unusable. Excellent little pool. I currently have a quarantined rescue turtle in it and in a few weeks I'll use it for baby chicks. The dimensions are perfect for putting an Xpen around it too.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool for my 19 month old grandson and it is the PERFECT size for out on my deck. I can sit in it with him and it helps me stay cool while staying outside with him as he plays. I put an expensive foam mat down and it makes it really comfortable. I could not be more pleased with this pool and hope it lasts at least for the rest of the summer. I think it will as the vinyl is quite thick and the poles make it VERY sturdy. I would highly recommend this pool over one of the cheaper hard plastic types available in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: 1kraftycounselor

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for an inexpensive hydroponics reservoir, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: Hydroponic growers will love this pool as an alternative to the expensive flood tray reservoirs! Yes, this is not the intended use, but it's ideal for growing vegetables, flowers, or cannabis. It can be used with a float system (styrofoam panels) or with a 4x4 flood tray mounted right to the top, as well as with bucket systems. And at a quarter of the price of hard plastic/resin reservoirs, it's worth every penny. And it's large water capacity means fewer water changes and more efficient aeration.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Redlin

customer_reviews.title: It is worth its price for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of the fabric as my dogs can be rough but the pool has lasted fine. Its been two weeks, we have had other rough dogs over for play dates and I love it, the dogs love it and its easy to clean. I just drain it and scrub the bottom quickly and fill her right back up. It was absolutely worth every penny even if it broke tomorrow. (and I do not believe it will break tomorrow) :)
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Great, a little too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, materials seem strong and sturdy. Baby seems to love it. I don’t fill it very much, just enough to splash around in, took a long time to warm up, so I ended up bringing out a few buckets of warm water. Didn’t give 5 stars because I feel like the prices were a bit ridiculous. We bit the bullet cause covid have everything shut down, and we wanted some kind of water toy for the baby, but it should have been cheaper than it was. 70 is too much. 50 at best.
customer_reviews.author: Lovingessentialliving

customer_reviews.title: Fun small pool
customer_reviews.text: This little pool is surprisingly roomy and holds a lot of water. I set it up easily and put a folded tarp under it to protect the bottom. As a little pool to cool off in the heat of the day it was perfect for what I wanted. The grandkids can splash around in it easily so it does everything expected for a littel pool like this. I don't expect it will be super sturdy over the long run but I am OK with that.
customer_reviews.author: M. Verber

customer_reviews.title: Horrible assembly instructions, but simple enough to figure out without them.
customer_reviews.text: First, I apologize for the negative seller review when the issue was NOT THEIR FAULT. The instructions are minimal, to say the least. However, it's pretty intuitive. Just remember that there are 2 packages of tubes and you match one from one package to another from the second package. After that, it's a breeze. And, should be easy to hang, still together, from the wall in a garage for storage.
customer_reviews.author: tatoland

customer_reviews.title: Needed this pool for whelping my Great Dane! It worked perfectly other than one corner ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed this pool for whelping my Great Dane! It worked perfectly other than one corner kept coming undone it worked perfectly once I moved it around 👏🏻👏🏻❤️ thank you for fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for whelping a litter of pups
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when the price went down to it's original retail price for the primary purpose of using it to whelp a litter of pups. I wanted something that I could break down and put away after use so that is why I didn't want a circular wading pool. Also, the square shape fit better against the wall in my dog room rather than a circular pool. Overall, I am satisfied with it and if I wanted to I could let my kids use it as a wading pool outside with their slide.
customer_reviews.author: Lilti9er

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog. Traditional hard plastic kiddie pools were getting too small for him. He’s about 90-95 lbs and loves to dunk in the water. It’s a sturdy, thick plastic and hasn’t torn from him jumping and splashing. It’s also very easy to clean, however the little plug at the bottom can tend to block itself while draining (the attached cap gets sucked back down on the hole) so you will need to keep an eye on it. All in all a great summer product!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Valentine

customer_reviews.title: but my mama's loved how much room they had and puppies were able ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a whelping bed for Aussies. It can sometimes fold in, being nylon, but my mama's loved how much room they had and puppies were able to stay in it longer than the more traditional kiddie pool from Walmart we all use. It's taller so puppies have a hard time escaping and the square shape fits better. Just be careful of pups getting stuck against the wall behind mom. Would give 5 stars, but I can't break it back down to store now that I'm in between litters. I suppose that is good for durability, but doesn't help with seasonal storage.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this about a week ago. everything was packed good, and it was really easy to assemble. i have a small patio and it fit perfectly. My 3 almost 4 yr old and my 2 year old fit there perfectly with enough space for both of them. i even went in one time lol and i'm 5'2 N i weight 135 and there was still enough space for them to play.!! i put 4 star on durability cuz i haven't had it for a long time yet but its holding up pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Magali r.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and get something else.
customer_reviews.text: Tore after one or two uses despite us being careful with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Umami

customer_reviews.title: Appalling company! Steer clear!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrendous! Grandchildren excited about it but couldn’t be put together as poles didn’t fit and a leg missing! Complained immediately... a leg without a base sent after we were told they’d replace the pool! The poles still didn’t fit together with or without the faulty leg! We have emailed over and over and we’re told to send a cut out of the liner which we disposed of as soon as a txt told us we’d have it replaced!!! Terrible customer secvise and kept over $60 for nothing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: As good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this for adults and as a water trough for wandering deer. If you have animals that can access the pool, I recommend not covering it due to potential damage the animals can cause. The frame is sturdy enough and cushioned for supporting arms. Vinyl is thick enough, and the drain plug works well. I add a little bleach to reduce algae growth, and use a pool sweep net for debris. Super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Noonan

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I opened immediately and assembled. Filled it up with water and walked in my house for 30 minutes. Came back out and the water was leaking out somewhere. After examining it very closely. There was an extremely small pin hole in the plastic. I am very disappointed and expected it to last longer than 24 hours. Sad thing is, nothing or no one touched the pool. Haven't even used the thing and it's garbage!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pope

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool for my pugs. I read the reviews so I bought the mats for underneath the pool at Job Lot (work out equipment mats). I also put rubber car mats inside the pool. I am just being cautious in case their nails damage it somewhere. The pool is great. It is 4 x 4 and nice quality. The jump in and out of the pool and enjoy it. I also give them baths in the pool, since it is easier! It has a plug so it is easy to empty too! So far so great!
customer_reviews.author: Janice M

customer_reviews.title: good, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool to use as a whelping box for puppies. The vinyl is good and sturdy, the frame is sturdy, a bit tricky to put together by yourself, but I love the padded rails! Easy to clean and wipe down, there was a bit of odor when I opened it up, but two days in the fresh air took care of that. So far I am very pleased with the quality of the pool for the use I put it to! Puppies are now 3 weeks old, and I am still very happy with the pool, so easy to keep clean, and no need for rails due to the flexible vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Titanic failure
customer_reviews.text: A leaking piece of garbage our rescued ducks did not even get to use it before it leaked as if we sliced it open with a knife creating a huge mess in their enclosure for me to clean up then I am told I need to return it to a UPS store? I don't think so what a huge disappointment, can you say no quality control if some are perfectly fine and others leak and are a piece of junk. Our poor ducks, back to the stock tank for swimming they go!
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good for whelping pups
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for whelping beds for two liters of puppies. They are perfect!!! Easy to clean and contains the pups in one place. I have Siberian Huskies and my oldest litter is 4 weeks old and still not able to climb out yet.. big plus lol. I don't expect that to last much longer, but it's been great so far! With the soft give-away sides I didn't use anything around it(pig bar), and everything worked great. Pups were able to move around even if mom was up against the side.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain to put together, but will serve my purpose which is for a whelping box. There were no instructions and the little snap knobs are very temperamental. Have a pair of needle nose pliers handy for when the snap knobs decide to stay stuck in. Also, having a long stick handy for when those snap knobs fall down the tube is a good idea as well. Put together when you have time to mess with it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you buy
customer_reviews.text: The design is amazing but the qualiy is not great. The material they used to make this is not thick at all even the weight of the water as already causing the pool to expand. The one i bought has tiny wholes (looks a little bigger than needle wholes) on the bottom. Maybe if they make it 5x thicker it would be worth it. Definitely not a swimming pool material. Disappointed with Intex brand. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great whelping pen
customer_reviews.text: Worked great as a whelping pen for our lab puppies! Was very easy to keep clean, and is the perfect height that mama was able to step in and out but puppies could not get out for the first several weeks. We did have to switch over to a larger pen around 6 weeks old however as they were big enough that they could crawl out at that point and needed more room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions, but product turns out like shown.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for the lack of assembly instructions. They offer 1 tiny, terrible nondescript picture. I have less frustration putting together IKEA products. Other than the struggle to assemble, it serves its purpose. Holds water, and enough space for an adult to sit stretched out. The vinyl feels a bit thinner/cheaper than the typical frame pool. Overall, satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric The Read

customer_reviews.title: If your kids have fun in the bath tub, then . . .
customer_reviews.text: If your kids have fun in the bath tub, then they will definitely enjoy the size of this pool (4’ x 4’). It’s much bigger than a bath tube, but not too big to fill and drain the water. It’s also not too big to clean and store. Assembly is easy and requires no tools. The plastic pool liner is durable, and the support rails are cushioned for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Had to find a YouTube video on how to put it together. The directions given in the box are no good. Good luck! Used it as a welping box for our German Shepard. It was ok. Puppies were able to get out by 4 weeks if they were determined to. Not sure how it will break down when time comes, durable material. One leg wouldn't stay in while moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The adults sat in it to talk and cool down on the patio! The kids loved it! The five year old floated in it👍 Just do you know I am a very fussy 75 year old retired teacher. So trust my review😍
customer_reviews.author: M. Blanton

customer_reviews.title: A Fail!
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my husband with this, but after my husband opened it & after taking everything out he didn't like the setup of the pool, plus he couldn't put it together! I was able to get everything back in the box thinking I'd like to send it back, but don't know if it's worth the effort to send it back! Update...I did send it back!
customer_reviews.author: treele

customer_reviews.title: A good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve liked to given 5 stars across because this is a good product at a reasonable price, but one of the 3 pools purchased split on the seam. We use these as whelping boxes, so the split isn’t that big of a deal. If it was from dog or puppy abuse I think it would be ‘clawed’ which it is not. I will still continue to use, and replace with this model as it fits our needs and is a perfect height. Easy to sanitize, wipe up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. I have a 3 year old and a 1 year old and they both love it. Can’t get them out of it. The thing is though we only use it on weekends and we keep it outside. Since it’s too much to assemble we just stand it next to our mango tree which collect water when it rains. We don’t want to keep assembling and disassembling every weekends. It’s great product though. Very sturdy and the material is thick.
customer_reviews.author: liby

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2 year old son last summer. It seemed durable with a thick plastic lining, but only lasted 2 months before getting a hole by the drain. Since the hole is right next to the drain we weren’t able to patch it and will have to buy a new one for next summer. We followed the manufacture instructions and did not put it directly on cement (it was on foam mats). I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaZ

customer_reviews.title: Really good pool ( just add a cover)
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pool and it has just the right size for my 3 year old kid. I assembled it by myself ( I don't have much strength in my hands) and it was a little bit difficult but not impossible. As other reviewers are pointing out it doesn't come with a cover. This can be fixed using a tarp and a sawing machine to make a cover as I'm showing in the pictures. I keep the pool always full and cover and I add 3 spoons of chlorine (bleach) on daily basis to keep the water clean. I have had this pool for several weeks and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pool with small flaw
customer_reviews.text: This pool is sturdy & feels like it will last a long time. I like how we can break it down when the weather cools down & store it. I would give this product a 5 but I gave it a 4 because my only complaint would be the placement & size of the drain plug. Its maybe the size of a quarter so it takes a long time to drain & it's on the bottom so the weight of the pool plugs it (i have to place something under to give it space to drain). I would give this product a 5 if they had put the plug on the side so it can actually drain out easier.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Yes!! Perfect little pool
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through at least two kiddie pools a summer for the last 5 years. I have a feeling this one is here to stay!! It’s perfect size for my 3 kids Perfect depth ( and you don’t have to fill it the whole way like some other pools) Easy to empty Lightweight so you can move it wherever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ducks have not destroyed, easy to dump and clean
customer_reviews.text: survived 6 months so far so I will buy another. ducks and geese havent killed it yet. ignore the people complaining about the drain being on the bottom and just pick up a side and pull out the legs and drop it down to drain. Im not sticking my hands in "duck water" anyway to pull a drain plug.
customer_reviews.author: Doc-14

customer_reviews.title: Had this less than 2 weeks - broke already
customer_reviews.text: When attempting to drain the pool, the plug ripped out from the bottom. I DO NOT expect this type of shoddy quality from a pool that costs nearly $70. I have not reached out to customer service, but I would expect to be getting a refund because this has to be a bad joke for such a crappy product to be so expensive and last less than 2 weeks. Would not buy this pool again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G

customer_reviews.title: This made a real hit!
customer_reviews.text: Had this pool sent as a birthday present for our Grandson. We haven't seen it in person, but have enjoyed watching him splashing in it via web-cam. Our son, his Dad, seems very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Turtle Camp!
customer_reviews.text: My female turtles are in egg-laying mode and they've both gotten too big for their current aquarium. So, we set up Turtle Camp in the living room for them to swim, dig and travel around the apartment. This Intex Mini Frame Pool seems plenty big for both our slider girsl, with easy on/off ramps to travel in and out.
customer_reviews.author: wendytime

customer_reviews.title: Great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because all the pools were closed due to COVID-19. I have a 4 year old and a 7 year old. They both have fun playing in it. Its not super deep but its deep enough and big enough where they can play in it to cool off. The lining is thick and has worked great for us and two energetic boys.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Great for ducks
customer_reviews.text: I like others use this as a small duck pond. It is durable enough that the ducks claws don't seem to pose a risk to it if they scratch the sides while swimming or when jumping up into it. It's also short enough that even the stockiest ducks can hop right over and in. It seems to be of good build frame-wise, and is the perfect volume and size to still be able to easily drain for frequent water changing. The price point is perfect to comparable to flimsy plastic kiddie pools often used in duck keeping.
customer_reviews.author: DSMAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great little pool for the grandkids .. I even sat innit and cooled off.. Would love an even bigger one It went together very easily and seems sturdy enough! Has a drain in the bottom so you can empty it easily and keep it fresh. The plastic is thick and looks like it will hold up
customer_reviews.author: wbcrazycop

customer_reviews.title: So close to being worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pool. My three kids loved this pool. It held up well to the every four day water change for the most part. We had cracked feet on two of the pool but still totally functional. Last night when I went to dump the water the entire drain ripped! Only 2 months I was expecting more time for the price I paid. The worst part is because of the location you can't patch it. I guess think about your use and if its worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Dog nail resistant!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 65lb German Shepherd. She was able to play in the pool even with her ever growing nails. We filled the pool about 1/2 way and let her play. She spent all summer digging in the water and splashing around to keep cool. Now that it’s fall we packed it away in its original box with no problems. All in all fantastic especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stevens

customer_reviews.title: With pool closed for Covid, grandkids loved this
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect little play pool for our 2 grandkids during the 110 degree Phoenix heat. Simple to put together and amazingly, fit back in the box when dried and done. We did take heed of the warnings when pulling the drain plug and didn't have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: John Cirocco

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get for your dogs, it holds up to their nails
customer_reviews.text: My Great Danes love playing in this pool, I highly recommend this for Giant Breed dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Scott P

customer_reviews.title: Study small pool
customer_reviews.text: The plastic fabric was much sturdier than I expected it to be. Am very pleased. Instructions were way too small to read and pretty useless, but assembly was manageable anyway. Just needed something inexpensive to fill to cool off the grandkids. At only 100 gallons, this worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Delton McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Came defective
customer_reviews.text: Set this up for my elderly dog and filled it about 1/4 full. Was gone about 90 minutes to grab dinner and it was empty when I returned. I checked the drain, it’s secure. Just has an immediate leak somewhere that I cannot see. 👎🏼 My dog (or anyone for that matter) never even had a chance to get in it.
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great little pool. It’s bigger and deeper than a standard baby pool. 7 year old using it and having fun
customer_reviews.author: KlynnD6521

customer_reviews.title: fits perfectly in the corner of my front porch and is easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a retirement gift for myself....fits perfectly in the corner of my front porch and is easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Risher

customer_reviews.title: Tougher than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Not as popular with the dogs as the hard sided round pool but so much easier to empty and move around the yard. Packs of exuberant dogs running through it and wrestling in it did not puncture it. I love the drain plug.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Garbage instructions, good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool for my one year old and she loves it. It was a lot of work to put together as the instructions just have one photo and nothing else. For everyone else there are two long bags of polls one poll from each bag makes up a side. I absolutely love this anyway. It even has a plug for draining. But I'm giving four stars for the shitty instructions and while the legs are sturdy to hold the pool up they fall out when you lift the pool to move it
customer_reviews.author: Mikala Boobar

customer_reviews.title: Rust after first week!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for baby before going on week vacation. Fairly easy to assemble and seems like a solid pool liner. The clips were not great and kept coming out. Ok once I got it setup. Baby and kids really enjoyed it. However, when I was taking apart to go home the foam was coming off and pipes were already rusting. Very disappointed at the quality. If aluminum pipes and better clips it would be 5 stars. I would not recommend as is.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute option for toddler pool
customer_reviews.text: Super cute option if you want something aside from the plastic tubs or the Inflatables! Easy to assemble and it fits my two and three year olds perfectly with room for maybe one or two more friends. Our plan is just to put a tarp over it when we're not using it
customer_reviews.author: ambar

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the drain
customer_reviews.text: I have it for less two months now. Used around 10 times. Product looks great. The frame is sturdy, but the blue material (I guess it is polyester) is pretty weak. Mine ripped off around the drain and there is no fix. The seller responded quickly and is sending me a replacement. I would not buy another one though. I believe this is a problem I would see again given how easy it ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Rimenez Souza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It took 15 minutes to assemble and the kids have played in it every day for two months.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my 2 yo and 4 yo to play in. Our great dane also stops by for a dip every now and then :) We wanted a pool that would be less susceptible to getting punctured by the dogs toenails, but that could also be folded up and stored in the cooler months. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Jomann

customer_reviews.title: Solid frame, but thin vinyl rips too easily
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 3.5 if i could. For the money, its a good value. As expected, the pool ripped easily and holes slowly started popping up maybe 1-2 weeks after assembly. Maybe it was because of the turtle. I would suggest using this mini pool as a frame and throwing some vinyl pool liner over the top just to avoid any drama later on.
customer_reviews.author: LEFTY

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were good and I was tired of blow up pools that only lasted a few times. This pool seems great, granddaughter had a blast in it..... Worth the money. I will write another review in a few months as to how it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our Aussie loves this pool!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect pool to beat the Colorado summer heat! Our dog loves jumping in and cooling off and splashing his toys around. He’s even pawed at the bottom a considerable amount and it’s perfectly intact. Easy to drain with the plug in bottom, outer corner. Highly recommend. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: CRJ//ARGJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kiddos on a hot day!
customer_reviews.text: Think I’m one of the few that bought this for children! LOVE it! Prefect for my 9month old and 3 year old! I put it on my porch to be in the shade, with those large foam puzzle pieces under it for cushion! Easy to empty and super light to move/store (when empty of course). Also a plus for kids: the bars are padded! Took me all of 20 mins to put together. Completely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: MelDub

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. I’m mostly happy.
customer_reviews.text: I do love it mostly. However I would like it better if the legs didn’t fall off every time I move it to clean under it. Otherwise it’s a great product. Very durable. My 3 year old hasn’t destroyed it. So it is tough. I did feel the need to put padding under it to help keep it from getting damaged. If the legs didn’t constantly fall off I’d give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah steel

customer_reviews.title: 2nd season & counting...
customer_reviews.text: We have a long summer season. The pool was in partial shade throughout the season, and treated with a chlorine float. I needed to clean it a couple of times during the summer, but it empties easily and is easy enough to scrub thoroughly. We stowed in out of the elements for the winter, and it's up and ready to enjoy again!
customer_reviews.author: Glennis F. Roseberry

customer_reviews.title: The drain feature is nice but takes a long time so I end up ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Saint Bernard and she's been getting in it every chance she has. I put it together by myself in under 10 minutes and have been enjoying it for the last month or so. The drain feature is nice but takes a long time so I end up just dumping it out to put fresh water in. Overall, a nice pool for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fendall

customer_reviews.title: Cute Pool But Was Lacking Pieces
customer_reviews.text: This came faster than anticipated by several days before the minimum which was great. However, upon opening the box, it was found to be lacking in the corner pieces, instructions, as well as the repair patch that was stated to be provided. I contacted the seller regarding the issue with a refund request. I didn't include it was lacking instructions because I didn't think it was even included, but found out via watching a YouTube video they are supposed to. Seller did respond to my request in a reasonable time and refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: SnowFrog

customer_reviews.title: It may be a kiddie pool, but we needed something like this, even without kids!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put together, but perfect size for washing the dogs! They can step in, you can wash from all sides (unlike in the tub), and it’s easy to empty and clean. BTW, our dogs are 140 lbs, so it’s easy for them to step in and out, so you can see why it’s better than using the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Lively Granddad

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool.
customer_reviews.text: Great little pool! There were no instructions for assembly, which was irritating, but it actually proved to be pretty simple to figure out by just looking at the picture of the assembled pool on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the smiles alone
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my dogs, well worth the money considering I don’t have to buy a new pool every summer. My dog is around 40 pounds and has plenty of room to splash around and play, my parents dog who is 80 pounds also enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Cross

customer_reviews.title: Fun, sturdy pool. Good for multiple uses.
customer_reviews.text: We use this inside as a corn pool. It's full of whole kernel corn that my son sits in and digs in with his tractors, shovels, etc. It holds up to rambunctious kids jumping in and out, tractors, etc. Very sturdy. Good size. Put together in ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these for our tortoises. They outgrew their enclosures, and this will keep them another few years. So far, this has held up for them for a couple of weeks now. It is nice, gives them plenty of room as well.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd loves this pool; it's durable enough to handle her nails.
customer_reviews.author: C. Watne

customer_reviews.title: Very delicate.
customer_reviews.text: The liner tore on the 2nd or 3rd use. I’d like a refund please.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Stelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Although I can't comment on the durability of this item because I just put it into use, I can say that, although the instructions are not very useful, assembly is very straightforward and easy. The grandkid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Stringman

customer_reviews.title: Great pool to cool off in
customer_reviews.text: Although it is small for adults, it is great for cooling off on hot humid days. The only downside is that the drain hole is on the bottom so you do have to manipulate the pool in order for it to drain.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kvietkauskas

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a very sturdy pool with a great liner. Cleans easy. My daughter put it together because she couldn't wait. We actually use it for our German Shepherds...who like to dig in the pool and its held up well. I also want to say I love that it has a drain plug as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri A. Fincham

customer_reviews.title: Works great as sandbox
customer_reviews.text: As image and described. Sturdy and works great as a sandbox for our son to play in. We don’t want to spend $$$ on wood sandbox as it is pricey and he will outgrow it so quickly or risk chance of getting splitters. This works good and will last for at least two years. We just need to get a cover so cover it during rain or prevent from the neighbor cat doing their business in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gna

customer_reviews.title: Truly Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 5 of them. 2 of them literally set for a year bc they're so durable that I didn't need to replace. The plastic is thick and of good quality. I buy them for my dogs and they hold up amazingly. Also the plastic cleans right off. Very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Goodson

customer_reviews.title: perfect 4x4 pool!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The company is wonderful and stands behind their product. Best pool I bought and the puppy loves it too. I can't praise this enough
customer_reviews.author: Karen D

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: The pool was perfect for my 2 and 4 yo. We got a good 2 months of fun out of it. We also kept it in the shed when not in use. However the liner surrounding the drain plug ripped, due to the plug being a tough to grab onto to pull out and the liner being a bit thin. I was expecting to use it for at least one whole summer. It really is a nice pool, but a thicker liner and better handle for the drain would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent materials
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! Was a little difficult to figure out the pipes . But well worth the money . The liner is like a real pool liner . Very nice and sturdy !! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sonja larson

customer_reviews.title: Injury due to slippery bottom
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is sturdy. The problem is the bottom of the inside when filled with water is extremely slippery. My 5 year old granddaughter slipped and fell out of it and broke her elbow and is now in a cast for the next two months. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money :-(
customer_reviews.text: We used this three times, very gently with two babies. It ripped in multiple places. I have NO IDEA how this could happen as it was well cared for, barely used and stored flat on our covered patio in Arizona where we have perfect weather.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pool for my 1 year old. The plastic is very thing and the frame is very sturdy. We’ve only used it once so far but she loved it and it was very easy to empty. Definitely beats the blow up pools!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived it was half the size we thought it was. For $50 I was really not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: fun

product_meta.title: Intex Mini Frame Pool
product_meta.description: Cool off in the summer time with this Intex Mini Frame Pool. Set up size is 48" x 48" x 12". Galvanized metal steel frame. Foam padded horizontal beams for comfort.
feature_bullets: Have fun splashing and playing in the Intex Mini Frame Pool.
Includes: Foam padded horizontal beams for comfort, drain plug & repair patch kit
Water capacity: 89 gallons (9-1/2” of wall height)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
